mapper.update:
update K_PRORESULTS
PRNAME = #{prname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRJOB = #{prjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRDEPT = #{prdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRTITLE = #{prtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRUNIT = #{prunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRENDID = #{prendid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRSTARTTIME = #{prstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROTHERS = #{prothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRSCORE = #{prscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRREMARKS = #{prremarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRSECOND = #{prsecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRTHIRD = #{prthird,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRACHNUM = #{prachnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRMEMBERS = #{prmembers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PRID = #{prid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update K_PRORESULTS set PRNAME = #{prname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRJOB = #{prjob,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRDEPT = #{prdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRTITLE = #{prtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRENDID = #{prendid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRSTARTTIME = to_date(#{prstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), PROTHERS = #{prothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRSCORE = #{prscore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRREMARKS = #{prremarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRSECOND = #{prsecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRTHIRD = #{prthird,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRMEMBERS = #{prmembers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRESOURCE = #{presource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PRID = #{prid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

PRSTARTTIME < to_date(#{statyear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and PRSTARTTIME > to_date(#{endyear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and KYID = #{kyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
